div.head: Description of changes for 2011.10
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft constructed from the Reims and Vatian manuscripts. Corrections and additions will be made after transcritions of the Sorbonne and St. Victor mss are completed. A initial ccritical apparatus has been constructed, but needs to be corrected and completed when the Sorbonne and St. Victor transcriptions are completed. Name and title elelments have been linked to canonical instances with a ref attribute. Troublesome transcriptions have been makred as unclear. Citations and cross-references still need to be added.
